origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenFinanceAPI.analyze_policy', 'description': 'This function analyzes government policies on green finance, focusing on their impact on the green bond market and green investments.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy, e.g., green_finance.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the policy analysis.'}, {'name': 'market', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific market affected, e.g., green_bond.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis results of the policy impact on the specified market.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenFinanceAPI.analyze_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'green_finance', 'year'是'2024', 'market'是'green_bond'.
